Package group10.client.controller

Class ScoreboardController

java.lang.Object
group10.client.controller.ScoreboardController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
@Component public class ScoreboardController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for Scoreboard screen.
Author:
Alperen Caykus, Mustafa Ozan Alpay

    • getScoreboard

      protected PagedEntity<Scoreboard> getScoreboard​(long days, long page)
      Gets scoreboard via sending HTTP request to server.
      Parameters:
      days - Requested day interval, such as last 7 days
      page - Page number as Scoreboard supports server side pagination.
      Returns:
      Scoreboard page

    • changeInterval

      protected void changeInterval​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Radio callback function. Changes the requested number of days parameter of scoreboard and fetches the selected number of days Supports 7 days, 30 days and all times.
      Parameters:
      event - Event caused by radio.

    • navigateToHome

      protected void navigateToHome​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)

      Parameters:
      event - Event caused by radio.
